title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Design a rocket propulsion system for a Mars mission. Include calculations for thrust, specific impulse, and fuel requirements.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze combustion efficiency in rocket engines. Compare different fuel types and their performance characteristics.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a rocket nozzle for maximum efficiency. Use CFD simulations to validate your design.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Complete a comprehensive quiz on aerodynamic principles, fluid dynamics, and airfoil design concepts.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze subsonic and supersonic flow patterns around aircraft wings. Create visualizations of pressure distributions.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Study aerodynamic heating during atmospheric re-entry. Design thermal protection systems for spacecraft.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design spacecraft structure capable of withstanding launch and orbital stresses. Perform structural analysis.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters for a satellite mission. Plan orbital maneuvers and trajectory corrections.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering spacecraft systems including power, propulsion, thermal control, and communication subsystems.

title: Functional Groups Lab
description: Identify and synthesize organic compounds with various functional groups. Write reaction mechanisms.

title: Stereochemistry Project
description: Analyze stereoisomers and their properties. Determine R/S configurations and draw Fischer projections.

title: Synthesis Challenge
description: Synthesize a complex organic molecule using multi-step reactions. Document each step with mechanisms.

title: Coordination Compounds Lab
description: Synthesize and characterize transition metal complexes. Determine oxidation states and geometries.

title: Crystal Field Analysis
description: Apply crystal field theory to predict properties of metal complexes. Calculate splitting energies.

title: Inorganic Synthesis Project
description: Design and execute synthesis of an organometallic compound. Analyze structure using spectroscopy.

title: Thermodynamics Problem Set
description: Solve problems involving enthalpy, entropy, and Gibbs free energy. Predict reaction spontaneity.

title: Kinetics Experiment
description: Measure reaction rates and determine rate laws experimentally. Calculate activation energy.

title: Quantum Chemistry Quiz
description: Assessment on quantum mechanics, atomic orbitals, and molecular orbital theory.

title: Elvish Translation
description: Translate texts between Sindarin, Quenya, and English. Demonstrate understanding of grammar and syntax.

title: Script Analysis
description: Analyze ancient inscriptions in Tengwar and Cirth scripts. Transcribe and translate historical texts.

title: Linguistic Research Paper
description: Write a research paper on the evolution of languages in Middle-earth. Compare linguistic features.

title: Diplomacy Case Study
description: Analyze the Council of Elrond as a case study in multi-species diplomacy. Identify key negotiation strategies.

title: Alliance Formation Project
description: Design a diplomatic strategy for forming alliances between different races. Consider cultural differences.

title: Conflict Resolution Essay
description: Analyze conflict resolution methods used during the War of the Ring. Propose alternative diplomatic solutions.
